mean_cn: v.释放；免除（责任、债务等）；发布，发行；  n.解除；释放；发布
mean_en: "to let somebody/something come out of a place where they have been kept or trapped; to stop holding something or stop it from being held so that it can move
sentence: The prisoner was released after his sentence was complete.
sentence_trans: 这个囚犯服完刑后被释放了。
word_etyma: re向后 + lease松开 → 释放，发布
